mapper.sql: select serial_No,batch_No,code_type, code, code_name, code_alias, status, parent_code, remarks, order_no,reason, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time from code_dict_temporary
mapper.insert:
insert into code_dict_temporary
serial_No, batch_No, reason, code_type, code, code_name, code_alias, status, parent_code, remarks, order_no, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time,
#{serialNo}, #{batchNo}, #{reason}, #{codeType}, #{code}, #{codeName}, #{codeAlias}, #{status}, #{parentCode}, #{remarks}, #{orderNo}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedBy}, #{updatedTime},
mapper.update: update code_dict_temporary set reason = CONCAT(ifnull(reason,''),'投保来源ID不能为空;') where batch_no=#{batchno} and ifnull(code,'')='' and code_type = 'cs_insurance_source' and status='0'
update code_dict_temporary set reason = CONCAT(ifnull(reason,''),'投保来源名称不能为空;') where batch_no=#{batchno} and ifnull(code_name,'')='' and code_type = 'cs_insurance_source' and status='0'

update code_dict_temporary set reason = CONCAT(ifnull(reason,''),'投保业务类别ID不能为空;') where batch_no=#{batchno} and status='0' and ((ifnull(code,'')='' and code_type = 'cs_complaint_business_item' ) or (ifnull(Parent_Code,'')='' and code_type = 'cs_insurance_source'))
update code_dict_temporary set reason = CONCAT(ifnull(reason,''),'投保业务类别名称不能为空;') where batch_no=#{batchno} and ifnull(code_name,'')='' and code_type = 'cs_complaint_business_item' and status='0'

update code_dict_temporary a,code_dict_temporary b set a.reason = CONCAT(ifnull(a.reason,''),'投保来源ID重复;') where a.batch_no=#{batchno} and a.status='0' and a.batch_no =b.batch_no and ifnull(a.code,'')!='' and ifnull(b.code,'')!='' and a.code_type = 'cs_insurance_source' and b.code_type = 'cs_insurance_source' and a.serial_no != b.serial_no and a.code = b.code

update code_dict_temporary a,code_dict b set a.reason = CONCAT(ifnull(a.reason,''),'投保来源ID重复;') where a.batch_no=#{batchno} and a.status='0' and ifnull(a.code,'')!='' and ifnull(b.code,'')!='' and a.code_type = 'cs_insurance_source' and b.code_type = 'cs_insurance_source' and a.code = b.code

update code_dict_temporary a,code_dict_temporary b set a.reason = CONCAT(ifnull(a.reason,''),'投保业务分类ID相同名称不同;') where a.batch_no=#{batchno} and a.status='0' and a.batch_no =b.batch_no and ifnull(a.code,'')!='' and ifnull(b.code,'')!='' and a.code_type = 'cs_complaint_business_item' and b.code_type = 'cs_complaint_business_item' and a.serial_no != b.serial_no and a.code = b.code and a.code_name!=b.code_name

update code_dict_temporary a,code_dict b set a.reason = CONCAT(ifnull(a.reason,''),'投保业务分类ID相同名称不同;') where a.batch_no=#{batchno} and a.status='0' and ifnull(a.code,'')!='' and a.code_type = 'cs_complaint_business_item' and b.code_type = 'cs_complaint_business_item' and a.code = b.code and a.code_name!=b.code_name

update code_dict_temporary a,code_dict_temporary b set a.reason = CONCAT(ifnull(a.reason,''),'投保业务内容错误;') where a.batch_no=#{batchno} and a.status='0' and a.batch_no =b.batch_no and ifnull(a.code,'')!='' and ifnull(a.Parent_Code,'')!='' and ifnull(b.code,'')!='' and a.code_type = 'cs_insurance_source' and b.code_type = 'cs_complaint_business_item' and a.Parent_Code = b.code and ifnull(b.reason,'') != ''
update code_dict_temporary a set a.status='1' where a.batch_no=#{batchno} and a.status='0' and ifnull(a.reason,'') = ''
update code_dict_temporary a set a.status='9' where a.batch_no=#{batchno} and a.status='0' and ifnull(a.reason,'') != ''
